title: [经济]shop —— 一个简易方便的商店插件[1.6.4-1.4.7]
author: pyhert123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:48 编辑 

shop 是一款简易 方便而有实用的商店插件 他和QS商店一样 具备chestshop和半砖商店的两种特性                       




shop_logo.png.-m1.png (11.11 KB, 下载次数: 957)

下载附件

2013-9-7 09:17 上传




    和chestshop（箱子商店）一样

他该怎么用？
如图所示:




QQ图片20130907092343.jpg (21.87 KB, 下载次数: 924)

下载附件

2013-9-7 09:27 上传






一开始放一个箱子 在箱子的正前方的第一个格子放置一块木牌
上面写到：




QQ图片20130907093200.jpg (10.66 KB, 下载次数: 904)

下载附件

2013-9-7 09:35 上传





第一行填写[shop]
第二行写出售数量
第三行写价格
第4行不用：但是想要弄无限商店的最后一行必须填admin
弄好以后就成这个样子如图：




QQ图片20130907093437.jpg (20.02 KB, 下载次数: 852)

下载附件

2013-9-7 09:38 上传





左下角提示
拿着你想出售的东西 左击牌子 然后就成了这一种情况如图：
我拿着的是绿宝石：




QQ图片20130907093638.jpg (25.72 KB, 下载次数: 827)

下载附件

2013-9-7 09:40 上传





左击一下：




QQ图片20130907093815.jpg (25.73 KB, 下载次数: 811)

下载附件

2013-9-7 09:42 上传





就成了这样子~~~

是不是很方便呢~~

怎么弄收购商店呢？
只需要在最后一行写 buy 就好了 

现在的问题是 收购商店不能成为管理员商店 如有发现请联系我修改帖子

和这个插件冲突的插件为：
PersonalPickup
BlockPickup  这两个插件 不过BBS里好像没人发


权限：
shop.use - 允许玩家使用商店
shop.create - 允许玩家创建商店
shop.destroy - 允许玩家摧毁商店 
shop.operator -允许玩家无视商店规则和限制。





下载：
1.6.2-1.5.2



Shop.jar
(71.73 KB, 下载次数: 18109)



2013-9-7 09:56 上传
点击文件名下载附件
阅读权限: 10





1.5.1-1.4.7



Shop (1).jar
(26.61 KB, 下载次数: 1669)



2013-9-7 09:58 上传
点击文件名下载附件
阅读权限: 10






更新日志：
v1.0 - initial release
v1.1 - Fixed bug with economy item being stuck on Emeralds. Made messages to player more specific and clear. Added "buy shops" that can buy items from players. Added double chest support for shops.
v1.2 - Added Vault support. Added admin shops that do not require the shop to be stocked and are not owned by anyone. Fixed bug where players were given emeralds at the start. Operators can now destroy other users shops when permissions are turned off. Be sure to delete the old config.yml file and reload the server after installing.
v1.3 - Fixed bug where admin buying shops would not pay the player and would take their items even if they did not have enough to sell. Added text fixes. Shops prices now appear red before players finish creating them.
v1.3.5 - HOLY JESUS BUG FIX UPDATE BATMAN!!! Fixed bug that allowed players to pick up display items. Fixed bug that made display items duplicate. Fixed bug that made display items disappear. (In essence, display items now work as they should.) Fixed bug where players could move the display item by placing a block on it. Fixed bug where players would be told that they didn't have enough emeralds when they did. Fixed bug where a full chest would allow players to steal items. Fixed a few bugs with admin shops. Also, I am really sorry about this but because the fixes were such a big change in code, you will need to recreate any shops you may have had from earlier versions. I appreciate you guys and your patience.
v1.4 - Fixed bug that allowed players to throw a similar item onto a display item and pick them both up. Fixed a bug involving admin buy shops not working. Fixed a bug that allowed mobs such as zombies to pick up display items.
